mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id, template_id, datasource_id, datasource_type, module_name, check_step, table_name, pro_table_name, field_name, field_aggregate, check_rule_type, threshold_value, rows_value, run_time_cron, check_consanguinity, module_type, module_rule, module_state, t2.templaten_name, t2.template_modules, t2.template_type, t2.template_desc, t1.create_time, t1.create_user FROM tb_datacheck_module t1 LEFT JOIN tb_template_config t2 ON t1.template_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 1 AND table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND module_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
